subject: Baseball
All Star Games
Television
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
lead_paragraph: The viewing audience for the All-Star Game was up about 3 percent from last year, in part, presumably, because of Derek Jeter’s final appearance in the event as a player.
snippet: The viewing audience for the All-Star Game was up about 3 percent from last year, in part, presumably, because of Derek Jeter’s final appearance in the event as a player.
